comments.body: Why did this trait become generic?

`AsyncResourceState` used to be an inner class of `AsyncResource` and this "locked" the generic `T` correctly but caused a warning that was silenced. I did this to make sure `AsyncResource` can use it by explicitly assigning the type but without causing the warning (caused by [this](https://github.com/scala/bug/issues/4440)).

diffHunk:
@@ -93,24 +91,25 @@ class TrackerMap(retentionPeriod: FiniteDuration, loggerFactory: NamedLoggerFact
 }
 
 object TrackerMap {
-  case class Key(application: String, party: String)
+
+  final case class Key(application: String, party: String)
+
+  sealed trait AsyncResourceState[+T <: AutoCloseable]
